metadata.title: CVE-2021-47155 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Net::IPV4Addr module 0.10 for Perl does not properly considerextraneous zero characters in an IP address string, which (in somesituations) allows attackers to bypass access control that is based on IPaddresses.

criterions.comment: libnetwork-ipv4addr-perl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
